channel.title: CVE Feed for NetApp -- OnCommand Unified Manager for 7-Mode (core package)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NetApp -- OnCommand Unified Manager for 7-Mode (core package)

item.title: CVE-2017-7568|2024-09-17T01:45:51.420Z -- netapp -- oncommand%20unified%20manager%20for%207-mode%20%28core%20package%29
item.description: NetApp OnCommand Unified Manager for 7-Mode (core package) versions prior to 5.2.3 may disclose sensitive LDAP account information to authenticated users when the LDAP authentication configuration is tested via the user interface.
